file_content.text: The smell of orange cliff-moss. Ghoral bird calls. Our favorite booth at the Gorge and Gab. All of it, gone.
Cliff-moss grows on other worlds. There are ghoral birds at every zoo in the sector. And we'll find a new cantina.
My mother's grave. My father's grave. We can't come back to those, can we?
Hmm. I wonder, what would your father say if he heard you right now?
"The memories are what matter, not the places." I suppose Makeb itself will be their grave. Could we just stay here for a minute?
Of course. Take as long as you want.
